sentences.sContent: Such a database would be extremely costly to set up.
sentences.sCn: 建立这样一个数据库要花很多钱。

sentences.sContent: His delay in making a decision could prove costly in the long run.
sentences.sCn: 他的优柔寡断长久下去要付出巨大代价。

sentences.sContent: ...That lets us avoid building costly plants or buying expensive power at peak usage time...

words.tran: 不花钱的；无须付出代价的
花费；使付出；使花许多钱

trans.tranOther: very expensive, especially wasting a lot of money
